name: bagman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who collects or delivers illegal payments or illegally earned money for someone else: He was alleged to have been a bagman for the Mafia. He was the corrupt politician's trusted bagman.
More examplesFewer examplesTwo lawyers in private practice have admitted being bagmen for clients seeking tax favours.He was a police lieutenant alleged to have turned mob bagman.He admitted to being a bagman for Mexican drug traffickers.He served as the club owner's bagman, delivering thousands of dollars in cash to commissioners and city officials.
